verses.verse: תְּפִלָּ֖ה <S%H8605><s%> A prayer לַחֲבַקּ֣וּק <S%H2265><s%> of Habakkuk הַנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> according שִׁגְיֹנֽוֹת׃ <S%H7692><s%> upon Shigionoth

יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> I have heard שִׁמְעֲךָ֮ <S%H8088><s%> thy speech יָרֵאתִי֒ <S%H3372><s%> [and] was afraid יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD פָּֽעָלְךָ֙ <S%H6467><s%> thy work בְּקֶ֤רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> of the years חַיֵּ֔יהוּ <S%H2421><s%> revive בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> of the years תּוֹדִ֑יעַ <S%H3045><s%> make known בְּרֹ֖גֶז <S%H7267><s%> in wrath רַחֵ֥ם <S%H7355><s%> mercy תִּזְכּֽוֹר׃ <S%H2142><s%> remember

אֱל֙וֹהַ֙ <S%H433><s%> God מִתֵּימָ֣ן <S%H8487><s%> from Teman יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> came וְקָד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> and the Holy One מֵֽהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> from mount פָּארָ֖ן <S%H6290><s%> Paran סֶ֑לָה <S%H5542><s%> Selah כִּסָּ֤ה <S%H3680><s%> covered שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> the heavens הוֹד֔וֹ <S%H1935><s%> His glory וּתְהִלָּת֖וֹ <S%H8416><s%> of his praise מָלְאָ֥ה <S%H4390><s%> was full הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> and the earth

וְנֹ֙גַהּ֙ <S%H5051><s%> And [his] brightness כָּא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> was as the light תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become קַרְנַ֥יִם <S%H7161><s%> he had horns מִיָּד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> [coming] out of his hand ל֑וֹ וְשָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> and there חֶבְי֥וֹן <S%H2253><s%> and there [was] the hiding עֻזֹּֽה׃ <S%H5797><s%> of his power

לְפָנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> Before יֵ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> goes דָּ֑בֶר <S%H1698><s%> the pestilence וְיֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> went forth רֶ֖שֶׁף <S%H7565><s%> and burning coals לְרַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> at his feet

עָמַ֣ד ׀ <S%H5975><s%> He stood וַיְמֹ֣דֶד <S%H4058><s%> and surveyed אֶ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth רָאָה֙ <S%H7200><s%> he beheld וַיַּתֵּ֣ר <S%H5425><s%> and drove asunder גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations וַיִּתְפֹּֽצְצוּ֙ <S%H6327><s%> were scattered הַרְרֵי־ <S%H2042><s%> mountains עַ֔ד <S%H5703><s%> and the everlasting שַׁח֖וּ <S%H7817><s%> did bow גִּבְע֣וֹת <S%H1389><s%> hills עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> the perpetual הֲלִיכ֥וֹת <S%H1979><s%> his ways עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> [are] everlasting לֽוֹ׃

תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under אָ֔וֶן <S%H205><s%> in affliction רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I saw אָהֳלֵ֣י <S%H168><s%> the tents כוּשָׁ֑ן <S%H3572><s%> of Cushan יִרְגְּז֕וּן <S%H7264><s%> did tremble יְרִיע֖וֹת <S%H3407><s%> [and] the curtains אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> of Midian ס

הֲבִנְהָרִים֙ <S%H5104><s%> the rivers חָרָ֣ה <S%H2734><s%> displeased יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Was the LORD אִ֤ם <S%H518><s%> Or בַּנְּהָרִים֙ <S%H5104><s%> the rivers אַפֶּ֔ךָ <S%H639><s%> your anger אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or בַּיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> against the sea עֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5678><s%> your wrath כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> that תִרְכַּב֙ <S%H7392><s%> that thou didst ride עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on סוּסֶ֔יךָ <S%H5483><s%> upon thine horses מַרְכְּבֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H4818><s%> [and] thy chariots יְשׁוּעָֽה׃ <S%H3444><s%> deliverance

עֶרְיָ֤ה <S%H6181><s%> was made quite תֵעוֹר֙ <S%H5783><s%> naked קַשְׁתֶּ֔ךָ <S%H7198><s%> Thy bow שְׁבֻע֥וֹת <S%H7621><s%> [according] to the oaths מַטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> of the tribes אֹ֣מֶר <S%H562><s%> [even thy] word סֶ֑לָה <S%H5542><s%> Selah נְהָר֖וֹת <S%H5104><s%> with rivers תְּבַקַּע־ <S%H1234><s%> Thou didst cleave אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

רָא֤וּךָ <S%H7200><s%> saw יָחִ֙ילוּ֙ <S%H2342><s%> thee [and] they trembled הָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> The mountains זֶ֥רֶם <S%H2230><s%> the overflowing מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of the water עָבָ֑ר <S%H5674><s%> passed by נָתַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> uttered תְּהוֹם֙ <S%H8415><s%> the deep קוֹל֔וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice ר֖וֹם <S%H7315><s%> on high יָדֵ֥יהוּ <S%H3027><s%> his hands נָשָֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> [and] lifted up

שֶׁ֥מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> The sun יָרֵ֖חַ <S%H3394><s%> [and] moon עָ֣מַד <S%H5975><s%> stood still זְבֻ֑לָה <S%H2073><s%> in their habitation לְא֤וֹר <S%H216><s%> at the light חִצֶּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H2671><s%> of thine arrows יְהַלֵּ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> they went לְנֹ֖גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> [and] at the shining בְּרַ֥ק <S%H1300><s%> of thy glittering חֲנִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2595><s%> spear

בְּזַ֖עַם <S%H2195><s%> in indignation תִּצְעַד־ <S%H6805><s%> Thou didst march through אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land בְּאַ֖ף <S%H639><s%> in anger תָּד֥וּשׁ <S%H1758><s%> thou didst thresh גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> the heathen

יָצָ֙אתָ֙ <S%H3318><s%> Thou wentest forth לְיֵ֣שַׁע <S%H3468><s%> for the salvation עַמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people לְיֵ֖שַׁע <S%H3468><s%> [even] for salvation אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְשִׁיחֶ֑ךָ <S%H4899><s%> with thine anointed מָחַ֤צְתָּ <S%H4272><s%> thou woundedst רֹּאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> the head מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> out of the house רָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked עָר֛וֹת <S%H6168><s%> by discovering יְס֥וֹד <S%H3247><s%> the foundation עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against צַוָּ֖אר <S%H6677><s%> unto the neck סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah פ

נָקַ֤בְתָּ <S%H5344><s%> Thou didst strike through בְמַטָּיו֙ <S%H4294><s%> with his staves רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the head [פְּרָזֹו כ] (פְּרָזָ֔יו <S%H6518><s%> village ק) יִסְעֲר֖וּ <S%H5590><s%> they came out as a whirlwind לַהֲפִיצֵ֑נִי <S%H6327><s%> to scatter עֲלִ֣יצֻתָ֔ם <S%H5951><s%> me their rejoicing כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> like לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> [was] as to devour עָנִ֖י <S%H6041><s%> the poor בַּמִּסְתָּֽר׃ <S%H4565><s%> secretly

דָּרַ֥כְתָּ <S%H1869><s%> Thou didst walk בַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> through the sea סוּסֶ֑יךָ <S%H5483><s%> with thine horses חֹ֖מֶר <S%H2563><s%> [through] the heap מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> of great

שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי ׀ <S%H8085><s%> When I heard וַתִּרְגַּ֣ז <S%H7264><s%> trembled בִּטְנִ֗י <S%H990><s%> my belly לְקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> at the voice צָלֲל֣וּ <S%H6750><s%> quivered שְׂפָתַ֔י <S%H8193><s%> my lips יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> entered רָקָ֛ב <S%H7538><s%> rottenness בַּעֲצָמַ֖י <S%H6106><s%> into my bones וְתַחְתַּ֣י <S%H8478><s%> my place אֶרְגָּ֑ז <S%H7264><s%> and I trembled אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Because אָנ֙וּחַ֙ <S%H5117><s%> in myself that I might rest לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day צָרָ֔ה <S%H6869><s%> of trouble לַעֲל֖וֹת <S%H5927><s%> when he cometh up לְעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people יְגוּדֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H1464><s%> he will invade them with his troops

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Though תְאֵנָ֣ה <S%H8384><s%> Although the fig tree לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תִפְרָ֗ח <S%H6524><s%> shall not blossom וְאֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> and there יְבוּל֙ <S%H2981><s%> neither [shall] fruit בַּגְּפָנִ֔ים <S%H1612><s%> [be] in the vines כִּחֵשׁ֙ <S%H3584><s%> shall fail מַעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H4639><s%> the labour זַ֔יִת <S%H2132><s%> of the olive וּשְׁדֵמ֖וֹת <S%H7709><s%> and the fields לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no עָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> shall yield אֹ֑כֶל <S%H400><s%> no meat גָּזַ֤ר <S%H1504><s%> shall be cut off מִמִּכְלָה֙ <S%H4356><s%> from the fold צֹ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> the flock וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> be no בָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> and [there shall be] no herd בָּרְפָתִֽים׃ <S%H7517><s%> in the stalls

וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> in בַּיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD אֶעְל֑וֹזָה <S%H5937><s%> Yet I will rejoice אָגִ֖ילָה <S%H1523><s%> I will joy בֵּאלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> in the God יִשְׁעִֽי׃ <S%H3468><s%> of my salvation

יְהוִ֤ה <S%H3069><s%> The LORD אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> God חֵילִ֔י <S%H2428><s%> [is] my strength וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and he will make רַגְלַי֙ <S%H7272><s%> my feet כָּֽאַיָּל֔וֹת <S%H355><s%> like hinds' וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> on בָּמוֹתַ֖י <S%H1116><s%> upon mine high places יַדְרִכֵ֑נִי <S%H1869><s%> [feet] and he will make me to walk לַמְנַצֵּ֖חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief singer בִּנְגִינוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H5058><s%> on my stringed instruments
